mcq.statement: When was the SAARC Charter signed, marking the establishment of the South Asian Association for Regional Cooperation?
mcq.one_liner: The South Asian Association for Regional Cooperation (SAARC) was established with the signing of its Charter in **Dhaka on 8 December 1985**.
